dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but like, is this weather even real? I mean, Kazakhstan, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but like, is this weather even real? I mean, Kazakhstan, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I saw this Kazhydromet report and I was like, wait, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I saw this Kazhydromet report and I was like, wait, what?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet has published the weather forecast for Kazakhstan for April 1, 2, and 3.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Rain turning to snow at night? In April? That's just... uh, wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rain turning to snow at night? In April? That's just... uh, wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the northern and eastern regions, rain may turn into snow at night.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wild is an understatement! And then, like, strong winds everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild is an understatement! And then, like, strong winds everywhere.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Strong winds are expected in the western, northern, and eastern regions, while fog may form in mountainous areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Except the central and south, though. They're just, you know, chilling with dry weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Except the central and south, though. They're just, you know, chilling with dry weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Only the central and southern parts of Kazakhstan will remain mostly dry due to the influence of a high-pressure system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that high-pressure system, right? So unfair.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that high-pressure system, right? So unfair.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Only the central and southern parts of Kazakhstan will remain mostly dry due to the influence of a high-pressure system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! Meanwhile, fog in the mountains. Like, what a mix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! Meanwhile, fog in the mountains. Like, what a mix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Strong winds are expected in the western, northern, and eastern regions, while fog may form in mountainous areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the temperatures! They're all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the temperatures! They're all over the place.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Most of the country, um, going from, what, 8 to 13, up to 15 to 20.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Most of the country, um, going from, what, eight to thirteen, up to fifteen to twenty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Daytime temperatures in most of the country are expected to rise from 8-13ÂC to 15-20ÂC...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But then the south, like, 28 degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But then the south, like, twenty eight degrees.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: While the west drops? That's just... confusing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: While the west drops? That's just... confusing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the west, temperatures will drop from 15-25ÂC to 13-22ÂC," the forecast states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! From 25 down to 13? In one go?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! From twenty five down to thirteen? In one go?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the west, temperatures will drop from 15-25ÂC to 13-22ÂC," the forecast states.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And they already issued a storm warning for March 31st. Just setting the stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they already issued a storm warning for March thirty first. Just setting the stage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet issued a storm warning due to adverse weather conditions in several regions of Kazakhstan on March 31.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's just non-stop. Unstable weather for most of the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just non-stop. Unstable weather for most of the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...changes in atmospheric pressure systems will bring unstable weather to most of Kazakhstan, with rain and thunderstorms expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Unstable, uh, is the word. Definitely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unstable, uh, is the word. Definitely.
